Key Match Events: Nitish Reddy smacked seven sixes and four fours in scoring 74 runs off 34 balls
Rinku Singh played a rescuing hand with 53 off 29 balls
Reddy completed his all-round performance, picking 2-23 in four overs
India scored 120 runs in the final 10 overs and posted the second highest T20 total against Bangladesh
Bangladesh was restricted to 135-9 in 20 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Reddy said, 'I feel great to represent India and it is a proud moment for me. I want to give credit to the captain and coach (Gautam Gambhir), they gave me the license to play my shots and I took my time. I want to continue playing this way for India.'
